title: WTB - T206 Piedmont Backs Graded 5+ or Raw in Ex/Ex+ condition
author: Mantle77CA

posts.post_title: WTB - T206 Piedmont Backs Graded 5+ or Raw in Ex/Ex+ condition
posts.post_content:
Hi everyone. Getting back into the hobby here and new to the forum. I’m focusing on T206 Piedmont backs that are 5 range and higher (or raw in Ex or higher). As far as grading company, I’m open. If it’s a more obscure grading company and the card is obviously altered, I’m not interested 

Anyhow, if you have any cards that fit the bill, feel free to contact me. I have a high eBay rating that I can use as a reference if necessary since I’m new here.
Bumpity Bump - still looking to add to my collection!
